snippet: Israel’s advocates in the United States, mirroring the reaction among many in Israel, are scrambling to respond to the pro-Palestinian economic and disinvestment campaign.
abstract: Advocates for Israel in United States are endeavoring to respond to pro-Palestinian campaign known as Boycott, Divest and Sanction, or BDS, with some states like South Carolina implementing legislation to curtail campaign; Congress is likely to vote on trade legislation that would blacklist companies that support campaign, which many American Jews see as anti-Semitic.
lead_paragraph: Israel’s advocates in the United States, mirroring the reaction among many in Israel, are scrambling to respond to the pro-Palestinian economic and disinvestment campaign.

headline.main: Israel’s Allies in U.S. Challenge Boycott
headline.print_headline: Allies in U.S. Mount a Defense of Israel
